steps.description: Save app password from clipboard into yahoo_imap credentials
steps.code:
import subprocess, sys
from agent.memory.credentials import get_credential, save_credential

creds = get_credential('yahoo') or {}
username = (creds.get('username') or '').strip()
if not username:
    print('Missing yahoo username (run: Cred: yahoo)')
    sys.exit(1)

try:
    pw = subprocess.check_output(['powershell','-NoLogo','-NoProfile','-Command','Get-Clipboard'], text=True).strip()
except Exception as exc:
    print(f'Failed to read clipboard: {exc}')
    sys.exit(1)

if not pw:
    print('Clipboard is empty. Copy the app password and rerun setup.')
    sys.exit(1)

pw = pw.replace(' ', '').replace('-', '')
if not pw:
    print('Clipboard app password is empty after cleanup. Copy it again and rerun setup.')
    sys.exit(1)

save_credential('yahoo_imap', username, pw)
print('Saved yahoo_imap app password from clipboard.')

learn-agent-help.name: Learn (Agent Help)
learn-agent-help.description: Lists installed playbooks and opens the local AGENTS.md/README for reference.

steps.description: List playbook files under any 'playbooks' directory.
steps.command: $dirs=@(); if(Test-Path .\playbooks){$dirs+=(Resolve-Path .\playbooks).Path}; $dirs+=Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Directory -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.Name -ieq 'playbooks' } | Sort-Object FullName | ForEach-Object { $_.FullName }; $dirs=$dirs | Sort-Object -Unique; if(-not $dirs -or $dirs.Count -eq 0){Write-Warning 'No playbooks directory found.'} else {foreach($d in $dirs){Write-Host "`nPlaybooks in $d"; Get-ChildItem -Path $d -File -Filter *.json -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Sort-Object Name | Select-Object Name, FullName | Format-Table -AutoSize}}

steps.description: Open AGENTS.md or README.md (prefers repo root).
steps.command: $target=$null; if(Test-Path .\AGENTS.md){$target=(Resolve-Path .\AGENTS.md).Path} elseif(Test-Path .\README.md){$target=(Resolve-Path .\README.md).Path} else {$target=(Get-ChildItem -Recurse -File -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue -Filter AGENTS.md | Sort-Object FullName | Select-Object -First 1).FullName; if(-not $target){$target=(Get-ChildItem -Recurse -File -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue -Filter README.md | Sort-Object FullName | Select-Object -First 1).FullName}}; if(-not $target){Write-Warning 'No AGENTS.md or README.md found.'} else {Write-Host "Opening $target"; Start-Process notepad.exe $target}
